title: Crypto derivatives’ daily trading volumes reach record highs
description:
Deribit and Coinbase Institutional reported record highs for crypto derivatives activity and trading volumes this week.

Daily trading volumes for crypto derivatives such as options and futures have surged this week hitting record highs on a number of exchanges. 

The crypto derivatives exchange Deribit said in a Feb. 29 X post that its 24-hour trading volume hit an all-time high of $12.4 billion on the day.

It added open interest, the number of derivatives contracts that have yet to be closed or settled on the platform, had passed $29 billion, another all-time high. Deribit’s third record was its client assets which reached $4 billion, it said.

Read more

title: Grayscale Bitcoin Trust witnesses significant outflows amid record-breaking BTC ETF trades
description: Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC), a prominent digital asset management firm, experienced another day of substantial outflows from its spot Bitcoin exchange-traded fund (ETF), with over $600 million exiting GBTC on February 29. This marks a total outflow of approximately $8.4 billion since the fund’s inception on January 11. Outflows from Grayscale Bitcoin Trust According to […]

title: AI in Education: Strengthening Cybersecurity in K–12 Schools and Colleges
description: With the increasing frequency of cyber threats targeting K–12 school systems in the US, the need for robust cybersecurity measures has never been more urgent. Traditional methods often fall short in the face of evolving cyber threats, leaving educational institutions vulnerable to attacks. However, integrating artificial intelligence (AI) into cybersecurity strategies offers a promising solution […]

title: Global AI Compact in Addressing Key Challenges and Stakeholder Roles
description: To address the burgeoning impact of artificial intelligence (AI) on a global scale, discussions have arisen regarding the necessity of a comprehensive global AI compact. Stakeholders from various sectors convened at the Global Technology Summit (GTS), emphasizing the urgency of such an agreement. title: Bipartisan Call for AI Regulation
description: Experts and legislators are urging legislative action in response to the swift developments in artificial intelligence (AI) to handle the numerous hazards and opportunities this developing technology presents. The nonpartisan nature of the issue and the pressing need for politicians to comprehend and successfully govern AI were highlighted by U.S. Senators Todd Young and Mark […]

title: Hong Kong’s SFC Forces Unlicensed Crypto Exchanges To Shut Down by May
description:
Hong Kong has reportedly announced the closure of receiving license applications from crypto companies on February 29. While Hong Kong received 22 applications from companies like Bybit, OKX, and Huobi to operate as crypto exchanges, leading players like Binance, Coinbase, and Kraken failed to apply. The Securities and Futures Commission (SFC) asserted that the crypto […]
